text: Assem Allam () (1 August 1939-3 December 2022) is an Egyptian businessman based in the East Riding of Yorkshire. He is the owner of Allam Marine, a company that makes generators. He is also the former owner of the Championship football team, Hull City. In 2006, he was named the UK Entrepreneur of the Year by Ernst & Young. ==References== Category:Ain Shams University alumni Category:2022 deaths Category:1939 births Category:Association football Category:Egyptian businesspeople
title: Assem Allam
